title: Implement drag-and-drop functionality for Kanban board
description: Create smooth drag-and-drop interactions for task cards between columns with visual feedback and animations

comments.text: Implemented basic drag functionality, working on visual feedback now
Added smooth animations and drop zone highlighting. Ready for testing.

title: Design and implement task filtering system
description: Build comprehensive filtering options by assignee, priority, status, and sprint with real-time search capabilities

comments.text: Working on the filter dropdown components. Should have the basic functionality ready by end of day.

title: Create responsive design for mobile devices
description: Optimize the entire interface for mobile and tablet devices with touch-friendly interactions and collapsible navigation

title: Implement real-time collaboration features
description: Add WebSocket integration for real-time updates when team members make changes to tasks, with live cursors and presence indicators

title: Build advanced reporting dashboard
description: Create comprehensive analytics with burndown charts, velocity tracking, and team performance metrics using interactive visualizations

title: Setup React Native development environment
description: Configure development tools, simulators, and build pipelines for both iOS and Android platforms with automated testing setup

comments.text: Development environment is fully configured. Both iOS and Android simulators are working perfectly.

title: Design mobile-first user interface components
description: Create reusable UI components optimized for touch interactions with consistent design language across platforms

title: Implement offline data synchronization
description: Build robust offline-first architecture with conflict resolution and automatic sync when connection is restored

title: Research and evaluate integration APIs
description: Comprehensive analysis of Slack, Teams, and Google Workspace APIs with implementation strategy and security considerations

comments.text: Completed API research. All three platforms have robust APIs that meet our requirements. Documentation prepared.

title: Build Slack integration middleware
description: Develop secure middleware for Slack API integration with proper authentication, rate limiting, and error handling

title: Design analytics data model and schema
description: Create comprehensive data model for tracking user actions, performance metrics, and generating meaningful insights

title: Implement interactive chart components
description: Build reusable chart components using D3.js or Chart.js with responsive design and customizable themes
